sense.name: a painting or photograph that is a likeness of (usually) a person
sense.examples: This Spanish artist painted the official portraits of all the members of the royal family. Mary had a portrait made of each of her three children. That street artist specializes in pastel portraits of people's pets. My grandfather's portrait was done in oil on canvas.

sense.name: a portrayal of someone or something, through words or behavior
sense.examples: The writer offers a fascinating portrait of the small fishing community. His portrait of the villain in the 1998 remake of the film has a postmodern slant.

sense.name: vertical orientation of a page, as opposed to landscape
sense.examples: Should I print these pages in landscape or portrait? Select 'portrait' in the Printing Options window.
